plugin.name: artisteerplugin
plugin.author: Per Sundberg
plugin.title: Artisteer plugin
plugin.description: \ Plugin that provides a simple controller for uploading artisteer zip file templates to grails. The plugin automatically unzips the template, creates a corresponding gsp layout file which links to an unpacked version of the artisteer template. The gsp contains links to other layouts that the user can customize (footer, title, menurendering). Footer and title etc is best to take from db, but I left it up to the user to configure that.
